sentences.en: At a time like this, scorching iron , not convincing argument, is needed.
sentences.cn: 现在这种时候, 需要的不是有说服力的论理, 而是炽热的烙铁.

sentences.en: Jack showed his dislike plainly in scorching satire.
sentences.cn: 杰克以尖刻的讽刺直率地表明了自己的厌恶.

sentences.en: Many people dream of scorching round a racetrack.
sentences.cn: 许多人梦想能绕着跑道飞奔。

sentences.en: Peasants are busy weeding under the scorching sun.
sentences.cn: 农民在炎炎烈日下忙着除草.

sentences.en: Scorching forces him to have a rest.
Seville is scorching in high summer.
sentences.cn: 塞维尔的盛夏热得灼人.

sentences.en: Summer pours scorching sunlight into the valleys.
sentences.cn: 夏日的骄阳照进了山谷.

sentences.en: The scorching torrent was enough to wither the face of the corpse.
sentences.cn: 这一阵激流似的痛骂,大可以使死人面上失色.

sentences.en: The sun will not beat upon them, not any scorching heat.
sentences.cn: 日头和炎热也不会伤害他们.

sentences.en: The volcano spewed out more scorching volcanic ashes, gases and rocks.
sentences.cn: 火山喷出更多灼热的火山灰、气体和岩块。

sentences.en: Working in the scorching sun all day has knocked me up.
sentences.cn: 整天在灼热的阳光下工作已把我累垮了.
